org.coniks.coniks_test_client

Class ClientMessaging

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_test_client.ClientMessaging

  • public class ClientMessaging
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all functions for exchanging CONIKS messages with a CONIKS server.

      ClientMessaging()

      Builds the ULNChangeReq protobuf message with a given username blob changeKey allowsUnsignedKeychange allowsPublicLookup The blob and changeKey fields may be null if no change is requested

      Sends a Registration protobuf message for the given user to the server.

      Sends a SignedULNChangeReq protobuf for the given user user including the signature on the the change message sig to the server.

      • setIsFullOp

        public static void setIsFullOp(boolean isFull)
        Sets the isFullOp flag
        Parameters:
        isFull - indicates whether the client is operating in full operating mode or in test mode

      • sendRegistrationProto

        public static void sendRegistrationProto(ClientUser user,
                                         java.lang.String server)
        Sends a Registration protobuf message for the given user to the server.

      • sendKeyLookupProto

        public static void sendKeyLookupProto(java.lang.String username,
                                      long epoch,
                                      java.lang.String server)
        Sends a KeyLookup protobuf message with the given username and epoch to to the server.

      • sendCommitmentReqProto

        public static void sendCommitmentReqProto(C2SProtos.CommitmentReq.CommitmentType commitmentType,
                                          long epoch,
                                          java.lang.String provider,
                                          java.lang.String server)
        Sends a CommitmentReq protobuf message requesting provider's signed tree root for epoch from server. If the server and provider are the same, commitmentType is SELF, otherwise it is WITNESSED. (Unused)

      • sendULNChangeReqProto

        public static void sendULNChangeReqProto(ClientUser user,
                                         java.lang.String server)
        Sends a ULNChangeReq protobuf message for the given user to the server.

      • sendSignedULNChangeReqProto

        public static void sendSignedULNChangeReqProto(ClientUser user,
                                               byte[] sig,
                                               java.lang.String server)
        Sends a SignedULNChangeReq protobuf for the given user user including the signature on the the change message sig to the server.

      • buildULNChangeReqMsgProto

        public static C2SProtos.ULNChangeReq buildULNChangeReqMsgProto(java.lang.String username,
                                                               java.lang.String blob,
                                                               java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey dsa,
                                                               boolean allowsUnsignedKeychange,
                                                               boolean allowsPublicLookup)
        Builds the ULNChangeReq protobuf message with a given username blob changeKey allowsUnsignedKeychange allowsPublicLookup The blob and changeKey fields may be null if no change is requested

      • receiveRegistrationRespProto

        public static com.google.protobuf.AbstractMessage receiveRegistrationRespProto()
        Receives and parses a RegistrationResp protobuf message from the server.
        Returns:
        The AbstractMessage (either of type ServerResp or RegistrationResp) upon success. null otherwise.

      • receiveAuthPathProto

        public static com.google.protobuf.AbstractMessage receiveAuthPathProto()
        Receives and parses an AuthPath protobuf message from the server.
        Returns:
        The AbstractMessage (either of type ServerResp or AuthPath) upon success. null otherwise.

      • receiveCommitmentProto

        public static com.google.protobuf.AbstractMessage receiveCommitmentProto()
        Receives and parses a Commitment protobuf message from the server. (Unused)
        Returns:
        The AbstractMessage (either of type ServerResp or Commitment) upon success. null otherwise.
